subject: Pro X Ultra Order incomplete
description_text:
Hello,
 Â on November 21st i ordered the Simsonn Pro X Ultra 2 Pedal Set with 
Baseplate and Haptic Motors.
The Motors and the 2 Pedals arrived, but the Heelrest and Baseplate are 
still missing. Can you look into my order ?

Ordernumber is: #SSN3712


Regards
Daniel Gembalies

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Gembalies,    We apologize, but the Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We have shipped it to you separately. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047114524800
